verses.verse: Moreover, the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"And you, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3068><s%> to the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'An end! <S%H7093><s%> The end <S%H7093><s%> is coming <S%H935><s%> on the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H3671><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

'Now <S%H6258><s%> the end <S%H7093><s%> is upon you, and I shall send <S%H7971><s%> My anger <S%H639><s%> against you; I shall judge <S%H8199><s%> you according to your ways, <S%H1870><s%> and I shall bring <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations <S%H8441><s%> upon you.

'For My eye <S%H5869><s%> will have <S%H2347><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> pity <S%H2347><s%> on you, nor <S%H3808><s%> shall I spare <S%H2550><s%> [you,] but I shall bring <S%H5414><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%> upon you, and your abominations <S%H8441><s%> will be among <S%H8432><s%> you; then you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord! <S%H3068><s%>'
"Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God, <S%H3068><s%> 'A disaster, <S%H9567><s%> unique <S%H259><s%> disaster, <S%H9567><s%> behold <S%H2009><s%> it is coming! <S%H935><s%>
'An end <S%H7093><s%> is coming; <S%H935><s%> the end <S%H7093><s%> has come! <S%H935><s%> It has awakened <S%H9516><s%> against <S%H413><s%> you; behold, <S%H2009><s%> it has come! <S%H935><s%>

'Your doom <S%H6843><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> to you, O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%> The time <S%H6256><s%> has come, <S%H935><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> â€“ tumult <S%H4103><s%> rather <S%H3808><s%> than <S%H3808><s%> joyful <S%H1906><s%> shouting <S%H1906><s%> on the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>

'Now <S%H6258><s%> I will shortly <S%H7138><s%> pour <S%H8210><s%> out My wrath <S%H2534><s%> on you, and spend <S%H3615><s%> My anger <S%H639><s%> against you, judge <S%H8199><s%> you according to your ways, <S%H1870><s%> and bring <S%H5414><s%> on you all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

'And My eye <S%H5869><s%> will show <S%H2347><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> pity, <S%H2347><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> will I spare. <S%H2550><s%> I will repay <S%H5414><s%> you according to your ways, <S%H1870><s%> while your abominations <S%H8441><s%> are in your midst; <S%H8432><s%> then you will know <S%H3045><s%> that I, the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> do the smiting. <S%H5221><s%>

'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the day! <S%H3117><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is coming! <S%H935><s%> [Your] doom <S%H6843><s%> has gone <S%H3318><s%> forth; <S%H3318><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> has budded, <S%H6692><s%> arrogance <S%H2087><s%> has blossomed. <S%H6524><s%>

'Violence <S%H2555><s%> has grown <S%H6965><s%> into a rod <S%H4294><s%> of wickedness. <S%H7562><s%> None <S%H3808><s%> of them [shall remain], none <S%H3808><s%> of their multitude, <S%H1995><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of their wealth, <S%H1991><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> anything eminent <S%H5089><s%> among them.

'The time <S%H6256><s%> has come, <S%H935><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> has arrived. <S%H5060><s%> Let not the buyer <S%H7069><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> the seller <S%H4376><s%> mourn; <S%H56><s%> for wrath <S%H2740><s%> is against <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their multitude. <S%H1995><s%>

'Indeed, <S%H3588><s%> the seller <S%H4376><s%> will not regain <S%H7725><s%> what <S%H4465><s%> he sold <S%H4465><s%> as long <S%H5750><s%> as they [both] live <S%H9130><s%>; <S%H9132><s%> for the vision <S%H2377><s%> regarding <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their multitude <S%H1995><s%> will not be averted, <S%H7725><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> will any <S%H376><s%> of them maintain <S%H2388><s%> his life <S%H9130><s%> by his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

'They have blown <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet <S%H8619><s%> and made <S%H3559><s%> everything <S%H3605><s%> ready, <S%H3559><s%> but no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> is going <S%H1980><s%> to the battle; <S%H4421><s%> for My wrath <S%H2740><s%> is against <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their multitude. <S%H1995><s%>

'The sword <S%H2719><s%> is outside, <S%H2351><s%> and the plague <S%H1698><s%> and the famine <S%H7458><s%> are within. <S%H1004><s%> He who <S%H834><s%> is in the field <S%H7704><s%> will die <S%H4191><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> famine <S%H7458><s%> and the plague <S%H1698><s%> will also consume <S%H398><s%> those in the city. <S%H5892><s%>

'Even when their survivors <S%H6412><s%> escape, <S%H6403><s%> they will be on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> like doves <S%H3123><s%> of the valleys, <S%H1516><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them mourning, <S%H1993><s%> each <S%H376><s%> over his own iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>
'All <S%H3605><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> will hang <S%H7503><s%> limp, <S%H7503><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> knees <S%H1290><s%> will become <S%H1980><s%> like water. <S%H4325><s%>

'And they will gird <S%H2296><s%> themselves with sackcloth, <S%H8242><s%> and shuddering <S%H6427><s%> will overwhelm <S%H3680><s%> them; and shame <S%H955><s%> [will be] on all <S%H3605><s%> faces, <S%H6440><s%> and baldness <S%H7144><s%> on all <S%H3605><s%> their heads. <S%H7218><s%>

'They shall fling <S%H7993><s%> their silver <S%H3701><s%> into the streets, <S%H2351><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> shall become <S%H1961><s%> an abhorrent <S%H5079><s%> thing; <S%H5079><s%> their silver <S%H3701><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> shall not be able <S%H3201><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> them in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the wrath <S%H5678><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> They cannot <S%H3808><s%> satisfy <S%H7646><s%> their appetite, <S%H5315><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> can they fill <S%H4390><s%> their stomachs, <S%H4578><s%> for their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> has become <S%H1961><s%> an occasion <S%H4383><s%> of stumbling. <S%H4383><s%>

'And they transformed <S%H7760><s%> the beauty <S%H9469><s%> of His ornaments <S%H5716><s%> into pride, <S%H1347><s%> and they made <S%H6213><s%> the images <S%H6754><s%> of their abominations <S%H8441><s%> [and] their detestable <S%H8251><s%> things <S%H8251><s%> with it; therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will make <S%H5414><s%> it an abhorrent <S%H5079><s%> thing <S%H5079><s%> to them.

'And I shall give <S%H5414><s%> it into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the foreigners <S%H2114><s%> as plunder <S%H957><s%> and to the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> as spoil, <S%H7998><s%> and they will profane <S%H2490><s%> it.

'I shall also turn <S%H5437><s%> My face <S%H6440><s%> from them, and they will profane <S%H2490><s%> My secret <S%H6845><s%> place; <S%H6845><s%> then robbers <S%H6530><s%> will enter <S%H935><s%> and profane <S%H2490><s%> it.

'Make <S%H6213><s%> the chain, <S%H7569><s%> for the land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of bloody <S%H1818><s%> crimes, <S%H4941><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of violence. <S%H2555><s%>

'Therefore, I shall bring <S%H935><s%> the worst <S%H7451><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and they will possess <S%H3423><s%> their houses. <S%H1004><s%> I shall also make the pride <S%H1347><s%> of the strong <S%H5794><s%> ones <S%H5794><s%> cease, <S%H7673><s%> and their holy <S%H6942><s%> places <S%H4720><s%> will be profaned. <S%H2490><s%>
'When anguish <S%H7089><s%> comes, <S%H935><s%> they will seek <S%H1245><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> but there <S%H369><s%> will be none. <S%H369><s%>

'Disaster <S%H1943><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> upon disaster, <S%H1943><s%> and rumor <S%H8052><s%> will be [added] to rumor; <S%H8052><s%> then they will seek <S%H1245><s%> a vision <S%H2377><s%> from a prophet, <S%H5030><s%> but the law <S%H8451><s%> will be lost from the priest <S%H6><s%> and counsel <S%H3548><s%> from the elders. <S%H6098><s%>

'The king <S%H4428><s%> will mourn, <S%H56><s%> the prince <S%H5387><s%> will be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with horror, <S%H8077><s%> and the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> will tremble. <S%H926><s%> According <S%H4480><s%> to their conduct <S%H1870><s%> I shall deal <S%H6213><s%> with them, and by their judgments <S%H4941><s%> I shall judge <S%H8199><s%> them. And they will know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>' "
